description: This CSS file defines styles and variables for theme management, including light and dark themes, as well as styles for various components such as the App, App-header, and theme toggle button.

classes.name: App
classes.description: The main container class for the application, it handles layout and theming.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header class for the main application, controlling its background and positioning.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Class styling for the application logo, including animations.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Class for links in the application, styling for colors and transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Class for the button used to toggle themes in the application.

methods.name: App-logo-spin
methods.description: Keyframe animation that spins the App logo.
